org.drip.execution.parameters

Class ArithmeticLinearMarketCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.execution.parameters.ArithmeticLinearMarketCore

  • public class ArithmeticLinearMarketCore
extends java.lang.Object
    ArithmeticMarketCore contains the Core Arithmetic Market Evolution Parameters used in the Almgren and Chriss (2000) Optimal Trajectory Generation Scheme. The References are: - Almgren, R., and N. Chriss (1999): Value under Liquidation, Risk 12 (12). - Almgren, R., and N. Chriss (2000): Optimal Execution of Portfolio Transactions, Journal of Risk 3 (2) 5-39. - Bertsimas, D., and A. W. Lo (1998): Optimal Control of Execution Costs, Journal of Financial Markets, 1, 1-50. - Chan, L. K. C., and J. Lakonishak (1995): The Behavior of Stock Prices around Institutional Trades, Journal of Finance, 50, 1147-1174. - Keim, D. B., and A. Madhavan (1997): Transaction Costs and Investment Style: An Inter-exchange Analysis of Institutional Equity Trades, Journal of Financial Economics, 46, 265-292.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
